root.name: Street Racer
root.description: Launch Game Street Racer was a North American launch game for the Atari 2600 on October 1977. The game launched alongside other 2600 launch titles that included: * Air-Sea Battle * Basic Math* Blackjack* Combat* Indy 500 * Star Ship * Surround * Video OlympicsNine launch games in total for the Atari 2600 near the end of the disco age.
